column4: Can someone please help. I am new to linux and trying to upgrade Lmms
so can anybody help with lmms?
hi the repositories(where u get ur updates from) don't necessarily have the latest, cutting edge version of software
oh ok, so how do i update that?
if you really need it, then u have to either get the deb packages of the software, or compile it yourself
ye I tried, but I need Qt4 or something to compile it, but cant install that..
what version ubuntu r u running?
on the lmms website, they have binaries for ibex(8.10)
ye but im so new to this, and every time I download a file or try to install i need to get more files first
ye thats what I mean, lol but anyways, cheerz, thanks..
